summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Shadow Stix are creamy, easy-to-use eyeshadows in a stick. These ultra-pigmented shadows glide on effortlessly for long-lasting, high impact color - just swipe, blend, go. Use the built-in sharpener to refresh tip as needed.
details: DetailsBenefitsCreamy, multi-tasking eyeshadow stickSuper pigmented for high impact colorInnovative formula glides on effortlessly & lasts all dayBuilt-in sharpenerItem 2609345How To UseApply directly onto lids for effortless eye looks. Can also be used as an eyeshadow base, liner, or smoked out. Use the built-in sharpener at the end to refresh tip as needed.IngredientsHoney BB: Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Beheneth-5, C26-28 Alkyl Dimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax, Polyethylene, Paraffin, Synthetic Beeswax, Alumina, Acetylated Glycol Stearate, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Palmitic Acid. May Contain: Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Black 2 (Ci 77266), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Bronze Powder (Ci 77400), Chromium Hydroxide Green (Ci 77289), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Copper Powder (Ci 77400), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Mica (Ci 77019), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140).
how_to_use: Apply directly onto lids for effortless eye looks. Can also be used as an eyeshadow base, liner, or smoked out. Use the built-in sharpener at the end to refresh tip as needed.
ingredients: Palmitic Acid. May Contain: Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000)

reviews.headline: Arrived spilled
reviews.comments: I wouldn't buy this online cause it arrived spilled

reviews.headline: The easiest to blend!
reviews.comments: I tried one of the matte shades and it is so easy to blend!  Also a great price point for an eyeshadow stick!  Works better than other ones I have tried from high end brands.

reviews.headline: Easy to use
reviews.comments: Great color.  Easily blends.  Love it.

reviews.headline: Perfect if you're on the go!
reviews.comments: I use this for my everyday look. It glides onto the eyelid like butter. Way easier to apply vs using a brush and applying power eyeshadow. I don't even use primer before applying. Will be buying more colors!

reviews.headline: I use these for my quick 10 min everyday face
reviews.comments: They are easy to put in and smudge with your finger. If your lids get oily you may have to resmudge once or twice throughout the day but I don't always have to. Especially if I wear them like a shadow liner!

reviews.headline: it's a pass
reviews.comments: I got this in the color socialite. it is really pretty but creases within an hour even with a mattifying eye primer. would not recommend for that reason.

reviews.headline: Wow i love this
reviews.comments:
I got the eye shadow in the color socialite 
And i love it so much 
It stays on so well all day
And its a beautiful color.
And got one for my friend as well

reviews.headline: Bar with me
reviews.comments: Bare with me is a Lot lighter than pictures. Its almost skin tone, but looos much darker in these pics. I am returning for a darker color, but do love the shadow!

reviews.headline: Why do these smell like an ashtray?
reviews.comments: These have some pretty colors, they dont really have the best staying power, but the worst part is that they smell like an ashtray. I dont know why they have to smell this awful?!?

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: I had to return. Color didn't show up very well and did not have staying power.

reviews.headline: Perfect pigment, compact and so easy to use
reviews.comments: Looks great alone, or as a glue when I use a shimmer powder eye shadow.

reviews.headline: Perfect pigment, compact and so easy to use
reviews.comments: I like to wear this alone and as a "glue" for a powder shimmer.

reviews.headline: pretty shade, but NO lasting power
reviews.comments:
I love the shade (I got Hey Bestie) and it's very easy to work with.  Unlike other shadow sticks I've tried, this one is not stiff, and glides pretty seamlessly.  I love being able to just apply it to my skin without needing to use makeup tools!

I gave it 3 stars because it has ZERO staying power.  Like none!  Even in the inner corner of my eye, where the makeup typically stays put, it somehow disappears 3 hours later.  I guess for the price I can't complain, but I would prefer something a bit more long lasting.  If you don't mind this then it's a great product otherwise.

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments:
I got Hey Bestie. Color and and shimmer is gorgeous,
Love how it goes on and stay but it pretty easy to get off. Going to get new colors soon

reviews.headline: Cocktail party/bare with me
reviews.comments: I am a simple makeup type of girl so I picked these up the other day, and they are amazing!! I just swipe them on and blend out with my fingers. Super easy and they lasted literally all day long with no creasing.

reviews.headline: LOVEEEE
reviews.comments: I got honey BB, and it is STUNNING. It's a more natural shade with some shimmer, which was exactly what i was looking for! Applies so smoothly, and looks and feels expensive. Amazing!

reviews.headline: Doesn't stick around.
reviews.comments: I bought Quokka and Cocktail Party. They play well together- pretty colors that blend out easily. However, there was no trace of these left by the end of the day. I seriously couldn't see either eyeshadow 12 hours later. I will have to play with these (maybe powder my eyelids first?), but the lasting power is so underwhelming, I wouldn't repurchase or buy in more shades.

reviews.headline: WOW!!
reviews.comments: Wow!!! Where have these been all my life?! And why am I just finding out about them now?! These are amazimg and I'll definitely recommend them to everyone!! I wish they had a darker matte brown. They used to but not currently available on ulta.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I have many of these shadow stix in a variety of colors. My most recent purchase included Hey Bestie and Juicy Gossip. I wanted to call these out in particular because they had way more "wow" factor in person that I wasn't expecting from the pics online. Juicy Gossip is VERY sparkly and has a lot of dimension. Hey Bestie has an irridesence that adds another level to it. I've loved every shade I've gotten so far but these two were a fun surprise!

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I have many of these shadow stix in a variety of colors. My most recent purchase included Hey Bestie and Juicy Gossip. I wanted to call these out in particular because they had way more "wow" factor in person that I wasn't expecting from the pics online. Juicy Gossip is VERY sparkly and has a lot of dimension. Hey Bestie has an irridesence that adds another level to it. I've loved every shade I've gotten so far but these two were a fun surprise!

faceoff_positive.comments: I am offering a review because I feel sad this is only getting an average of three stars right now!  I love these fun colors and the soft, creamy formula.  I'd compare this to the NYX jumbo eye shadow stick which I also like.  It isn't as long lasting as my Bobbi Brown cream shadow stick or IT superhero shadow stick; but it's also much less costly.  I truly enjoy all my shadow sticks and it has been fun collecting the ColourPop options at such a price.  My favorite thing to do is blend multiple colors from inner eye outward.  I also appreciate how easy they are to use on my lower lid since I have somewhat hooded eyes and don't go for a lot of liner on top.
faceoff_positive.headline: Give it a chance

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love the shade (I got Hey Bestie) and it's very easy to work with.  Unlike other shadow sticks I've tried, this one is not stiff, and glides pretty seamlessly.  I love being able to just apply it to my skin without needing to use makeup tools!

I gave it 3 stars because it has ZERO staying power.  Like none!  Even in the inner corner of my eye, where the makeup typically stays put, it somehow disappears 3 hours later.  I guess for the price I can't complain, but I would prefer something a bit more long lasting.  If you don't mind this then it's a great product otherwise.
faceoff_negative.headline: pretty shade, but NO lasting power
